TopicTitle: If you like KSP, you will also like this: Robocraft

Articles.Content:
I've discovered this game just a few days ago and it sure is great fun!

You build rovers (tanks) and spaceships (hovercraft or planes) piece by piece, but often only to see them get destroyed by your enemy, piece by piece.

http://robocraftgame.com/

It is officially in Alpha and gets a lot of updates.

Edited July 17, 2014 by Astronomer

I used to play this, but now I hate it.

The developer is turning this into a depressing world of tanks clone. Every update makes the game more and more pay to win. Do not play this.
No, its more like "pay to unlock stuff faster" game. I like it, im in tier 3 now, i hope they will balance it quickly as the railguns are overpowered, even developers said this.

No, its more like "pay to unlock stuff faster" game. I like it, im in tier 3 now, i hope they will balance it quickly as the railguns are overpowered, even developers said this.

Yep, I can agree - railguns are OP. I can't say this game is pay to win because of its' tier leveling system. I am also tier 3.
I love to snipe the guns off of other people's vehicles with the railguns. Right now I use 6 tier four railguns on my craft.

Really what ended it for me was the introduction of the HP system. It was fun at first because you could only get killed when your pilot/command chair was shot, but HP make sit so shooting off stuff that is not needed like armor and such will reduce HP. It is becoming a lot like World of Tanks.

I've played it a lot and do not enjoy it. The "team balencing" is meh at best, and I have to grind for hours to build a good tank... only to discover it sucks and I should've bought something else.

I wish it wasn't free to play! Then we could've had things like campaigns or "Creative mode" to test bots!

(THIS ISN'T A BUMP BECAUSE IT'S RELEVANT INFO)

Yeah, I hate it, my friend and I decided that the person that worked with the balance on that should never work with games again, SMGs are useless, Plasma Launchers are Op but have HORRIBLE accuracy.

Railguns can insta-kill some tanks and by tanks I mean giant blocks of armor with guns on it.

NOTHING MORE.
I think even if it wasn't relevant info it would be fine cause the last post was 3 days ago...
I loved the game until it released the repair update 75% of all the players hated. Now the community is acting like the game is mlg players only.
